baseline_groups.claim_summary: Age-specific curfews imposed on individuals over 65 during COVID-19 increased mental distress (z_depression) at the RD cutoff of December 1955 birth month.
baseline_groups.notes: Single baseline specification: sharp RD with bandwidth=45 months, linear polynomial, controls for ethnicity/education/female, clustered on birth month (modate). The baseline coefficient (0.14, p=0.18) is not statistically significant at conventional levels.

global_notes: 87 total specifications. The paper uses a sharp RD design with birth month as the running variable. The baseline claim concerns z_depression (a standardized mental health index). Many rows test alternative outcomes (mobility, channels, individual symptoms) which represent different estimands.
